settings.title: For Yourself
settings.paragraph: The perfect way to keep your home fresh and beautiful. Get a regular delivery of stunning bouquets straight to your doorstep without lifting a finger. Enjoy the beauty and fragrance of fresh flowers hassle-free!

settings.title: As a Gift
settings.paragraph: Simply provide us with their address and let us take care of the rest, delivering beautiful blooms straight to their doorstep at the frequency and duration of your choosing.

settings.title: For Business
settings.paragraph: Is a great way to create a pleasant atmosphere and leave a good impression on your guests and customers. Fresh floral arrangements will improve the aesthetic image of your business, and our service guarantees timely replacement without extra care or effort on your part.

settings.subscription_main_section__right_column: px-4 py-10 flex flex-col gap-12 lg:w-1/2 md:p-20 lg:h-full lg:justify-center border-brand-black lg:border-l

settings.title: Choose a plan
settings.text: Select the subscription plan that suits you best from our three bouquet designs: classic, seasonal, and deluxe. Each plan comes with a designer vase, free delivery, and a discount of up to 30%. Our seasonal and deluxe plans also include a luxurious scented candle to enhance the ambiance.
settings.tw-why-choose-us__benefit-block__content: py-10 px-4 gap-4 flex flex-col md:p-20 md:gap-4 border-b-[1px] border-brand-black lg:border-l

settings.title: Frequency and Duration
settings.text: Choose delivery frequency: once a week, every two weeks, or once a month. Then, select your subscription duration from 3 to 12 months. Enjoy savings with a longer subscription. We understand that every customer has different needs, and we aim to provide flexible subscription options that cater to your specific preferences.
settings.tw-why-choose-us__benefit-block__content: py-10 px-4 gap-4 flex flex-col md:p-20 md:gap-4 border-b-[1px]  border-brand-black lg:border-l

settings.title: Pay once
settings.text: After entering your contact and delivery information and paying for your subscription, you can sit back and relax, knowing that you have secured a regular supply of fresh, stunning flowers for yourself or your loved ones
settings.tw-why-choose-us__benefit-block__content: py-10 px-4 gap-4 flex flex-col md:p-20 md:gap-4 border-brand-black lg:border-l

settings.state_1__main_info_div__paragraph:
Enjoy free shipping on every order and save up to 30%.

Every bouquet we deliver is carefully curated to ensure it arrives fresh and stunning. To modify, pause, or cancel your subscription, simply log in to your account dashboard. You're in complete control of your flower delivery experience.
settings.state_2__main_info_header: How often do you want flowers delivered?
settings.state_3__main_info_header: How many deliveries would you like ?
settings.state_3__main_info_paragraph: Pay once and do not worry about flowers, our bouquets will be beautiful and on time, as many times as you need.

settings.title: How often will I get a new bouquet?
settings.content: The perfect way to keep your home fresh and beautiful. Get a regular delivery of stunning bouquets straight to your doorstep without lifting a finger. Enjoy the beauty and fragrance of fresh flowers hassle-free!
settings.collapsible_content: text-brand-black opacity-90 mt-3 text-mobile-caption leading-5 md:text-desktop-subtitle lg:leading-6

settings.title: Can i send subscription like as a gift ?
settings.content: Absolutely ! This is the most convenient way to show your feelings, subscribe to the address to whom you want to deliver bouquets and we will please that person with beautiful bouquets
settings.collapsible_content: text-brand-black opacity-90 mt-3 text-mobile-caption leading-5 md:text-desktop-subtitle lg:leading-6

settings.title: Can I choose which bouquet I get ?
settings.content: Each subscription option is carefully selected by our specialists. Our florists select the best and freshest varieties for delivery that surprise and delight every time; thus, the current subscription offer does not allow you to choose a different bouquet for each delivery or to receive the entire subscription with one particular bouquet. Each bouquet will be individual and made according to your chosen plan - classic, seasonal or luxury bouquets
settings.collapsible_content: text-brand-black opacity-90 mt-3 text-mobile-caption leading-5 md:text-desktop-subtitle lg:leading-6

settings.title: Can I change the shipping address ?
settings.content: Yes, you can! After you create an account, you can log in and adjust your settings to pause the next delivery and let us know the next best delivery date.
settings.collapsible_content: text-brand-black opacity-90 mt-3 text-mobile-caption leading-5 md:text-desktop-subtitle lg:leading-6

settings.title: What day will the subscription bouquet come?
settings.content: Depending on the day you first choose for your flower delivery, we will deliver on that day for all future deliveries. So if you get your flowers on Thursday every other week, you will get another flower delivery two weeks later on Thursday.
settings.collapsible_content: text-brand-black opacity-90 mt-3 text-mobile-caption leading-5 md:text-desktop-subtitle lg:leading-6

settings.title: Can I suspend my subscription to flowers ?
settings.content: Yes, you can! After you create an account, you can log in and adjust your settings to pause the next delivery and let us know the next best delivery date.
settings.collapsible_content: text-brand-black opacity-90 mt-3 text-mobile-caption leading-5 md:text-desktop-subtitle lg:leading-6

settings.title: Lorem Ipsum
settings.content: Yes, you can! After you create an account, you can log in and adjust your settings to pause the next delivery and let us know the next best delivery date.
